channel.title: Pk points..work but dont show on interface thing?
channel.description:
ok, so when ppl pk..they kill ppl. it tells them theyre pk points.
like...
[code] sendMessage("You killed someone"+otherkillc+"those are your points now"); [/code]
but when i go to where it says combat lvl and total lvl and where it usually says qp if i put..
[code] sendQuest("@whi@Pkp:"+otherkillc+"", 3985); } [/code]
This doesn't quite work, it always says they have 0 "otherkillc" points. and it shouldnt, i had 11 and it kept saying 0, i got 12 and it still said 0;
so it always says:
[code] pkp:0 [/code]
ANY HELP??
PLEASE DONT SPAM/FLAME!

item.title: Pk points..work but dont show on interface thing?
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

Is otherkillc actually being changed? It may be being set back to 0 somewhere. The code for sending it seems to be ok.

Are you sending it in process() btw? Or somewhere else?

Read full topic
item.source: Pk points..work but dont show on interface thing?

item.title: Pk points..work but dont show on interface thing?
item.dc:creator: @Proview Proview
item.description:
@Proview wrote:

ok, so when ppl pk…they kill ppl. it tells them theyre pk points.

like…

sendMessage("You killed someone"+otherkillc+"those are your points now");

but when i go to where it says combat lvl and total lvl and where it usually says qp if i put…

sendQuest("@whi@Pkp:"+otherkillc+"", 3985);
	}

This doesn’t quite work, it always says they have 0 “otherkillc” points. and it shouldnt, i had 11 and it kept saying 0, i got 12 and it still said 0;

so it always says:

pkp:0

ANY HELP??

PLEASE DONT SPAM/FLAME!
